key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including SEC violations and labor disputes
Market volatility due to exposure to the oil and gas sector
Labor shortages and safety concerns in the construction industry
controversies: SEC settlement for internal control and record-keeping violations
OSHA fines and NLRB labor relations violations
Contract dispute with Westlake Chemical Corporation
environmental_issues: Involvement in fossil fuel projects attracting environmental scrutiny
Safety incidents and OSHA violations impacting ecological and operational safety
social_issues: Workplace safety violations and wage-related issues
Labor shortages affecting project timelines and costs
governance_issues: SEC violations raising concerns about governance and compliance practices
Need for improved alignment of operations with ESG goals despite the establishment of an ESG Committee
